title: Time to expand?
description:
Wendi Nix, Todd McShay, Andre Ware, and Tom LuginBill continue to preview the National Championship. Trevor Lawrence declares for the NFL draft, Todd McShay gives us his 1st NFL Mock draft. The Crew discuss X factors who could play a major role in Monday's championship game.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The Crew discuss the possibility of playoff expansion.
